channel.title: A couple questions for a project czar/hiya v1 source
channel.description:
Question 1. How can i add a highscore board to my server?
Question 2. I've seen a source with something called a "funpk" or something like that. basically what it is is where you fight people, but when they die they don't lose their items.
if you could tell me a code or send me a link to a tutorial i'd really appreciate it =]
